snippet: Quarterly operating profit before one-off items jumped 15 percent to 1.23 billion euros.
abstract: Airbus Group reports second-quarter profit of 1.23 billion euros, up 15 percent from year-ago quarter, surprising analysts.
lead_paragraph: Quarterly operating profit before one-off items jumped 15 percent to 1.23 billion euros.

headline.main: Robust Jetliner Business Buoys Earnings for Airbus
headline.print_headline: Robust Jetliner Business Buoys Earnings for Airbus
